section.simpara: Updates a value in the realtime configuration database.
Updates a value in the realtime configuration database. Updates the field columnUpdate with the value valueUpdate in the record matching family, column and value.
section.programlisting: ; As in our RealTime() example, we can update the record like so: exten => 123,1,RealTimeUpdate(sipusers,ext,5678,firstname,Richard) ; resulting SQL command: ; UPDATE sip_users SET firstname = 'Richard' WHERE ext = '5678'

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'RealTimeUpdate' =-
[Synopsis] Realtime Data Rewrite
[Description] Use the RealTime config handler system to update a value RealTimeUpdate(<family>|<colmatch>|<value>|<newcol>|<newval>)
The column <newcol> in 'family' matching column <colmatch>=<value> will be updated to <newval>. REALTIMECOUNT will be set with the number of rows updated or -1 if an error occurs.
